name: Jan Vikas Sansthan
briefDescription: "Vision    : “Create a society based on equality & rights, free from Exploitation and Discrimination”Mission:“Empowering deprived and vulnerable sections of society, particularly Dalit, Marginalized, Children and women, by education, protecting human rights, capacity building, and mobilization of communities and promoting overall developmentJVS work with unprivileged and disadvantage group of communities, especially Women, adolescents and children. The JVS focus following issues in that area. (1)Primary education & Women Literacy (2) Basic Primary Health Care (3) Sustainable livelihood (4) Women empowerment (5) Child rights & Child labor (6) Human Rights &Gender equality (7) Capacity Building programme (8) Climate change
